reviews.review: If you're a Bioshock Fan...get it! A+ Gameplay & Graphics!

Честно сказать не так много игр на моей памяти которые бы настолько цепляли сюжетом - пока что мне хватает пальцев одной руки для них. Bioshock Infinite смело могу занести в этот список. Эта игра и ее сюжетные дополнения это тот случай когда увидев концовку сидишь и переживаешь всё так будто это произошло с тобой. Отличная игра. Побольше бы в играх сюжетов подобного уровня.

A les petite r******* !!!! Tout les gens qui t'annonce que la fin de BS Infinite etait previsible bas non elle ne l'est pas du tout mais du tout du tout
Mais wahou quel claque du debut a la fin un jeu mener d'une main de maitre foncer si vous n'avez pas encore craqué

Probably the best single player FPS I've played in a very long while.  Not necessarily because of the combat, although riding the skyline for the first time is pretty dang epic, but because the story was just awesome. Interesting characters, strange twists, beautiful landscapes, and it even tugged on ye old heatstrings with some aspects of the story (no spoilers sorry).  Just....it was a great experience.  So much so that Im actually playing again through the harder '1999 mode' which I typically NEVER do.

For ANY fan of either the first 2 Bioshocks or an avid fan of FPS games, this is simply a must must buy.
Every Bioshock game is great. Great story, great action, and one of the best atmospheres a game can give.
Редкая игра с интересным геймплеем, интригущим сюжетом и великолепной атмосферой!

I found Bioshock Infinite to be a beautiful yet flawed game.   On one hand it has a beautifully crafted world, interesting characters and a story I was keen to unravel.  It’s just; I personally don’t think that a pure FPS was the proper vehicle to carry it.  I recently completed Human Revolution and when you juxtaposition the two the missing element of choice in Bioshock stands in stark relief.  As Adam Jensen I could choose how I handle situations, either by brute force or moving through the game with stealth and non-lethal means.  As Booker DeWitt, however, I had to essentially murder my way through hundreds of people that I really had no motivation to kill, many of whom you were forced to empathize with via the little recorded messages scattered throughout the world.   Let’s face it, the majority of your opponents are police/security forces, disenfranchised minorities trying to uplift themselves and disabled people stuffed into mechanical bodies.  I had no gripes with any of these folks and left to my druthers I would rather have rather of let the majority of them live.  The shifts between engaging story and discovery and gratuitous violence was simply jarring and out of place in the overall context of the game.
It is shame because I really loved the other elements of the game.   It’s just I could have had a little more conversation and a little less action.
One of the best single player games I've ever played!
9/10 - Story is amazing. Extremely polished aesthetics. Gameplay could be just a little better. Must be played by everyone.
Muy buen Juego :3 con una historia hermosa :)

Bioshock: Infinite est très bon! C'est sûr que ça ne ressemble pas à un Call of Duty ou à un Battlefield, mais aussi, l'histoire est prenante et je sens que le scénario a été bien travaillé dessus et c'est super! :-) 9\10
fucking amazing, blowing mind!

Честно говоря, мне не вполне понятны такие преисполненные счастьем визги людей, чуть ли не боготворящих игру, но судить чужие мнения не буду - каждый имеет на них право. Скажу лишь свое мнение.

Налицо надуманность сюжета, персонажи шаблонные.По прошествии половины игры лично меня сюжет особо не затягивает, персонажи тем более.

Многие ставят в плюс игре поразительную смену контрастов: например, что в райском небесном городе наблюдается расовая дискриминация и беспрекословное, абсолютное восхваление и подчинение тоталитарному правителю. У меня один вопрос: ну и что? Разве это может кого-то удивить? Либо все настолько тупые, что достаточно лишь показать такую возможность, чтобы все ахнули?! К слову, большая часть  многих обзоров посвящена подобным "плюсам".

Стилизация и окружение игры, не спорю, весьма оригинальны, поначалу было интересно исследовать город, но затем все скатилось к банальным однообразным пострелушкам. Имхо, геймплей поразительно скучен и однообразен, механика стрельбы не выдерживает никакой критики - сама стрельба реализована донельзя примитивно. Весь геймплей держится на 3х столпах: примитивная стрельба, энергетики и помощь Элизабет, которая иногда подкидывает тебе патроны и аптечки. Ставить в плюс ей то, что она не мешает - бред высшей мерки. Она и не должна мешать. Если бы еще и мешала, был бы очевидный минус.
Видов врагов очень мало, а все игровое действие по сути заключается в том, что нужно пройти от точке А к точке Б, зачистив весь путь, уничтожая тонны однообразных врагов однообразными методами. Столкновения с противниками похожи один на другой как две капли, различается лишь окружение. Не знаю как другим, но такой геймплей для меня нереально скучен.
Экономическая система донельзя примитивна - собирай монетки, обчищай сундуки и покупай на полученные копейки улучшения на оружие и на сверхъествественные способности. Кто придумает проще, чем "собирай монетки - покупай"? Мне бы хотелось это услышать.

WOW, what can I say. I wish this game was infinite. Solid game with amazing graphics and a storyline that will have you scratching your head for a while. Pick up this game if you want to be wowwed with the imersive gameplay while facing unique challenges and hours of fun.
This game is the true successor to the original Bioshock. With some truly awesome visuals and a story that is just as compelling as the first. A great game.

A game that polarises opinion... Within myself. For every great thing... There felt like there was a medocre or bad thing..  But what I can say with some conviction is that I really enjoyed the narrative of this game. It has a really interesting story, which is told well through the excellent voice acting, art direction and character animation. This aspect of the game excels,  the story dirven elements and in game narrative scenes are great... and it really was the story to dragged me to the finish.

I use the word dragged intentionally...  as a game... Bioshock Infinite is mediocre. It is very very very combat driven.. and that combat is tedious and unsatisfying. Dull is the best way to describe it, the weapons are all standard really without imagination or anything to make them stand out or particularly fun to use... the enemies have simple AI and pose little challenge on Normal difficulty (which is what I played) and the sheer weight of enemies you mow through just has to be a warcrime.

They are the same bad guys no matter which "faction" it is your fighting, they just have different badges or colours to diferenciate. The combat makes up 80% of the game (if not more) and it is for this reason it won't be a classic in my eyes.

The story however is excellent, a great ending which was really complex to get your head around, however the game succeeds in explaining it aptly.

I'll miss the relationship you forge with the main supporting character Elizabeth, who was a well written, well rounded and well acted companion throughout.

A good story locked in an uninspriing game which may have actually been better told as a book, at least in my opinion.
Is such a damn fun game that you won't get bored of.

I kinda wish this game had dropped the Bioshock title - with a plot based around alternate universes/timelines it's more Physhock, even though Rapture makes a cameo. It's not so much a horror game as Bioshock - ammo is less limited, enemies are more numerous but weaker, the creepier elements are fewer... The combat isn't as a good. But theres a good story here, some interesting ideas and the weird fact that it feels like you're hanging out with a Disney princess. Especially when she's singing and giving fruit to starving orphans. Main character has a voice and a character, unlike Bioshock's Jack, which I quite like. Generally good, but Bioshock is better. It teases you the whole damn game with a boss fight that never happens, too.
Ok this game is amazing. Best ending I've seen in a game!

This is probably one of the best games i've played in quite a while. Everything looks amazing and the player animation is spot-on. The weapons and powers are all easy to use and make the gamelpay more about experiencing a story, rather than shooting your way from A to B like so many other games of this type.
The mind fuck story and the beauty will either satisfy or punish you, thats why Bioshock series always awesome and its thrilling atmosphere :3
Шикарный дизайн, интересный сюжет и завораживающая архитектура - уже за это Bioshok infinite можно простить геймплейные огрехи и поррекомендовать всем пройти эту игру!

This game and I have always had very much a carot and stick type relationship. The carot being the rich story tellling, brilliantly extecuted sound track and picturesque scenery. The stick whilst short is still pointy and hurts my little tail. The stick being the at times montonous combat. Find two good weapons and stick with them although there is variety in vigours and you are encouraged to experiment with different combos. This breaks up what otherwise for me would have been a particularly irritating part of the game. The Skylines whilst good could have been utilalised better as it made little sense as to why you could not utilise vigors upon them. Another barb on this pointy little stick is it's over-reliance on the damsel in disstress trope that developers often use to give games a sense of purpose. Bring us the girl and whipe away the debt. I'll admit half the time I was expecting toad to pop up and go your princess is in another castle mario. The carrots however are so very juicy that I know little rabbits will overlook what are relatively minor flaws in an otherwise brilliant game. Booker was a very likeable character and found myself empathising with the character which does not happen very often. Futhermore who-ever had the idea of oldifiying songs deserves a cookie. It's made me a die hard metal-head broaden my horisons and aquire a taste for barbershop music.  The scenary is postively delectable and at times it will leave you staring like pervert at breast convention. Well anyway my little rabbits it's been fun 9/10.

Отличный геймплей, проработанные персонажи, возвращение в Восторг (Rapture). Сюжет шикарный – ты чувствуешь, что тебе взорвали мозг и понимаешь, что это было круто. 

- Booker... Are You Afraid of God? 
- No Im Afraid of You.

Once you start  playing you can't stop!
Great game.
mi juego favorito. nuff said

What a game... what a fucking game. I love it...

If you haven't played it yet , BUY IT NOW! You are not going to lose your money at all.

BioShock Infinite, as well as all BioShock games, is one of those titles that you must own to call yourself a human.  This game is beyond beautiful.  The game and its graphics and heart warming visuals had won me over in mere seconds, once again in minutes, again in a few minutes, and again in just a few more minutes.  I think you know where I am going with this.  This game doesn't let you go very long at all without taking your breath away once again.  The story is outstanding and has a crazy twist.  There are too many good things to say about this game and not even one reason for you to not own it.
Amazing storytelling, fantastic visuals and art, gameplay is extremely fun. Top 3 of 2013.

Хитро закрученный сюжет и постояннаяя интрига, не дающие забыться ни на минуту. Совершенно дичайше запутанный action с абсолютно невероятной концовкой. Плюс - прекрасная спутница! И это - Bioshock: Infinite.
Однозначно, лучший одиночный FPS последних 5 лет.
Endgeile Story... umwerfende Grafik und angenehme Rätsel.
Jogo fantastico, enredo perfeito, vale muito apena jogar, forte concorrente a melhor jogo do ano 2013.

Pretty visuals, but boring gameplay. 

On-rails shooter simplified for the console market, way different than what was shown on E3 prior to release. One ending and a shitty DLC system and storyline that aim towards nonesense.  Play it once, never touch it again.

Overall.. if you get this game for cheap, there's nothing to worry about. It's just not worth it's full price. 6/10

tip: Get Bioshock or Bioshock 2 if you haven't played it before.
This game is amazing you dont even have to play the other games in the series. A must buy for any fan of great story telling games and first person shooters.
An absolutely thrilling experience.  I loved the story and gameplay.
Es una jodida obra maestra..O.O

This game has been out a while now. But I wanted to wait for it to go on sale to avoid the hefty retail price. It finally did. And I beat it over 2 days of casual play.

First off.. Its Bioshock. The look and feel is still the same. Except you on a city in the clouds and not under the ocean. The visuals look awesome. I took lots of screenshots. The design, and the presentation is perfect. 

The gameplay, however was kind of a step back from the other Bioshock games though. It seemed very slow starting as far as the story goes. And then the way Weapons/Vigors worked annoyed me. A lot of the weapons were very similar. Same with the Vigors. and 90% of the time the Vigor was LMB to fire. RMB to set a trap..Or they were damage over time. Or they were just useless vigors. 

You could only have 2 Weapons carried (I think Bioshock 1-2 was 4 weapons?) and then you could only have 2 Vigors on you toggle at a time. Making you have to stop the game for a second to switch. Which is just annoying. It just seemed clunkly. 

While a city in the clouds is very cool to see. It took away a lot of the tension. While Bioshock 1 and 2 were more of a scary action FPS about psychotic spliced up murderers in a collapsed city under the ocean -- Infinite just loses that. Its an action FPS. But that creepy "anything could come crashing down at any moment" feeling isn't there. 

Also.. You'll find money and lockpicks. Early on the game will want you to have more lockpicks than you can find to open up safes. Later on.. you'll have them coming out of your ears and not enough secrets to spend them on. Money.. Its useless because many of the upgrades are useless. Its not until late game when you can upgrade your weapons.... Oh wait.. I can only carry 2 guns at a time.. why bother upgradings all these other weapons? THAT is very poor design.

I know all this sounds pretty bad. I'm ALWAYS harsh on games. I bludgeon them to death with every new release. That being said. Infinite is very enjoyable ONCE the game FINALLY gets going. For one playthrough its awesome. Its a tragedy again that there is no New Game+ option. And they took out Multiplayer that Bioshock 2 introduced? Since when do we want to go backwards? Shame..

Really the strongpoints in the game are the gunfights and the visual design. 
Id give it a 7/10. Buy it on sale. After one play through its done. You've seen everything. There are NO alternate endings like BS 1-2.
Не думал, что сюжет игры может так удивить! Аплодирую стоя!

Absolutely stunning game. Story was great and the gameplay was classic Bioshock gameplay but with a twist. The only problem I had with it was that the game only pushed you slightly in the right direction towards your objective, although you could push the button that would slap a big arrow on the floor telling you where to go, but I forgot about that a lot! In previous Bioshock games you can run around an open but linear style map but you always felt like you were going in the right direction but with Infinite you could do the same, I just found myself getting lost more often than I'd like.

The DLC was...a little Bizarre? It looked phenomenal but again, I got lost far too often because I kept forgetting I can push a button to show me where to go. I started Burial at Sea and kept finding myself short of ammo and salts which left me constantly slapping enemies in the face with my grapple hook so it got repetitive and boring. Of course the ending made sense...but then it didn't...and you understand it... but you don't so hopefully Episode 2 of the DLC will clear that up.

Overall, great game. Worth the buy if you love the Bioshock series.
One of the most entertaining games I've played in a while.  Stunning graphics, satisfying gameplay and a good story.  One of those "must play" games.

Всё как надо: и сюжет, и геймлей.
При прохождении Bioshock Infinite сильнее заметна принадлежность игры к жанру аренных шутеров, не так остро ощущавшаяся в первых частях из-за менее сжатых (как ни парадоксально с учётом подводного антуража) локаций и возрождения врагов, да и вообще многие игровые составляющие уступают играм-предшественницам (то же улучшение оружия сыровато). Также при прохождении, особенно повторном, тут и там всплывают ляпы в повествовании, а последние несколько уровней блещут невидимыми стенами, кривой геометрией и общей недоработанностью.
Но я стою на своём: достойно в целом сделана игра, рекомендую.

Лучше бы разработчики выпустили полноценный аддон, а не распиленные DLC. Формат сюжетных DLC плохо подходит под экшены. 

Burial at Sea - это 3 локации, одна из которых полностью "экскурсионная". Заканчивается турне жирным многоточием, как в Knife of Dunwall. Геймплейно - механика Infinite в декорациях первого BioShock. Играть интересно, но это больше заслуга ностальгии по 2007, чем разрабов.

"There's always a lighthouse. There's always a man. There's always a city..."

Прекрасное пополнение в серии. Пусть как шутер игра уже не удивляет так, как в 2007 году, зато игра контрастирует с первой частью буквально во всём, оставаясь при этом верной традициям серии. Это уже совсем другая история, но всё ещё Bioshock, со всеми вытекающими. И не проходите мимо последних двух сюжетных DLC.

[b]P.S.[/b] Комментируйте обзор и высказывайте свою точку зрения.
Una obra de arte que simplemente no te puedes perder!
Прекрасная история, первоклассный сюжет, отличный экшен. 10 из 10.
Mind = Blown

I understand some players fine it a bit dark, or confusing, however, this is only a single vision.
Understanding this, I will continue following the closest CG rendering of Audrey Hepburn to date. And enjoy it.

Not difficult, but an interesting story, with a great character.
I my opinion, a Classic.

Bioshock Infinite – одна из самых удивительных игр. Разработчики смогли создать фантастический и богатый мир. Сумели наполнить этот мир интересными и живыми персонажами. Они даже умудрились сочинить трогательный сюжет! Красивое окружение, великолепное музыкальное оформление, замечательный геймплей. Я считаю, что в эту игру должен поиграть каждый.
10/10

A masterfully crafted and beautiful dreamworld which kept me intrigued, eager and in awe almost the entire playthough. Fun, fast-paced and challenging fps gameplay juzposed by complelling and surprising storytelling. 2013 GotY imo.

Лучшая игра 2013 года на мой взгляд. BioShock Infinite - потрясающая история от Кена Левина. В этой игре есть очень сильный сюжет. Не такой как в современных играх, а настоящая драматургия, что очень редко для игровой индустрии. Почему эта игра шутер? В игре не интересно стрелять и бегать по укрытиям, хочется изучать этот мир, общаться с окружающими. Кен Левин поднимает многие темы на которые не принято говорить в играх, а то что в игре присутсвует инцест между отцом и дочерью, который они не перешли и о котором герои узнают в конце выходит за грань. Ни одна игра не подарит вам такие незабываемые чувства.
Моя оценка - 10/10
P.S. Спустя почти 4 года еще раз перепрошел игру с полной русификацией. И это значительно преобразило игру. По прежнему одна из лучших игр в которые я играл))

This game is one of the best I ever played. The whole franchise is one of the best I know. It may be a idea to get it from somewhere else then steam thought as they keep the release price for far to long.

The story is complex & engaging and ties together with the other games very well. The artwork and the graphic is superb. 

The combat system is quite simple and the hitboxes are bit to large (for a PC game at least, guess it works for consol), but it's still a really fun experince to run (and gun) around in this world and be amazed by the stunningly beautiful world around you.

Although we're not in Rapture anymore, Kevin Levine and his team still manages to surprise me with the beautiful city of Columbia.
I really enjoyed the first Bioshock, and Bioshock Ininite is not dissapointing.
Just like the previous games, bioshock infinte focus heavely on the story. It might even be better than the first game.

Rapture Şehrinin soğuk ve korku dolu atmosferinden, sıcak ve neşeli ortama sahip Columbia Şehrine gittiğimiz, Booker DeWitt' in borç batağından kurtulması için verilen görevi yerine getirme çabası ve geçmişine doğru yaptığımız yolculuğu ele aldığımız yapım.

Artılar;
+Atmosfer şahane.
+Müzikler, çevre sesleri, karakter seslendirmeleri muhteşem.
+Elizabeth'in yapay zekası muhteşem.
+Karakter tasarımları çok iyi.
+Hikaye güzel.
+Çatışmalarda kullanılabilecek yolların çeşitliliği bol. Neredeyse yapılabilecek sınırsız seçenek var.
+Kullanılan Vigorlar işlevselliği oldukça fazla.
+Günümüzdeki büyük sorunlardan olan 'Irkçılık' konusunun oldukça iyi işlenmesi.
+Optimizasyon şahane.
+Ana oyundan sonra gelen 'Burial at Sea: Part 1' ve 'Burial at Sea: Part 2' DLC'leri güzel.

Eksiler;
-Geniş alan çatışmalarının dengesi güzel ayarlanmamış.
-FPS türü olarak tam tokluk sağlamaması.
-Aksiyonun bulunduğumuz alana bir miktar düşmanın gelip onları öldürmemiz üzerine.
-'Loot' sisteminin abartılmış.
-Oyun sırasında yapılan seçimlerin bir etkisinin olmaması.
-İlk oyunlardaki gibi zorlu savaşların oldukça az.

Bioshock serisinin en son oyunu anlattığı hikaye, Elizabeth ile yaşanılanlar ve 'Sky-Line' isimli raylı sistemin çatışmalara getirdiği eğlence için bile oynanması gereken bir yapım.

Akla ve mantığa en yatkın şekilde tavsiyelerde bulunduğum [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/36934991-Greatshield/] küratör sayfamı [/url] alttaki linkten takip etmeyi unutmayın;

10/10
Кен Левин, можешь тратить мои деньги, которые я отдал за игру, с чистой совестью!
P.S. Все еще лучшая игра про параллельные миры.

A good game with a great story. Took me 15 hours to play through. I sort of want to play it again, which is saying a lot. My biggest complaint is the final fight. SMALL SPOILER: Suddenly the game becomes a tower defense and a whole new mechanic is introduced. Despite that one level, everything else about this game plays and balances very well. I say this game is definately worth purchasing.
В этой игре сюжет такой, какой не снился и иным закрученным фильмам. Какая ещё рекомендация нужна? 10\10.

Damn!I wish all developers would put even half the effort into making games as deep and detailed as this one...Very immersive game, found myself playing until 3 a.m., then waking up early morning to finish it! (9.5\10) Excellent!
Výborná hra! Skvělý příběh a hlavně konec!  Doporučuji! :)
Accidentally forgot to recommend this. It is an awesome game with fantastic design, story and playability. +100% of aawesomeness in the end if you played first 2 parts

Отличная игра. Очень интересный, но в тоже время безумно запутанный сюжет. Если честно, я так и не понял концовук. Но игра стоит потраченного на нее времени. Элизабет просто прекрасна! На мой взгляд, она - лучший персонаж из всех компьютерных игр в которые мне приходилось играть. Общая оценка 8/10
Drága, de megéri a pénzét.
Однозначно - игра года.
Eine anspruchsvoller Shooter mit einer wirklich sehr schön und ergreifend erzählten Geschichte. Die Grafik ist anspruchsvoll und der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist variabel.

Certamente um dos melhores jogos de 2013. História envolvente, jogabilidade refinada, gráficos lindo e a melhor side-kick dos games. Viva Elizabeth!

Recomendação: Apesar de serem histórias totalmente diferentes, é interessante jogar o primeiro bioshock antes de se jogar o Infinite. Esqueçam o segundo jogo.
